CAnimationAppUi Class Reference

#include <animationappui.h>

Inheritance diagram for CAnimationAppUi:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

CAnimationAppUi application UI class. An instance of class CAnimationAppUi is the UserInterface part of the AVKON application framework for the Animation example application.

Definition at line 45 of file animationappui.h.
